entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reliability issue on ARM64 Stage1 #86929
    8.0.0
  • EnableTrimAnalyzer on netstandard2.0 projects should lead developers to success #86924
  • TypeLoadException thrown from MetadataLoadContext should expose TypeName #86923
  • Trim analyzer doesn't warn on `GetType().GetMethods()` #86921
    8.0.0
  • WASM debugger connection flakiness #86919
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Wasm builds breaking with trimming - `error IL2040: FSharp.Core: Could not find embedded resource 'FSharpSignatureCompressedData.FSharp.Core' to remove in assembly 'FSharp.Core'` #86916
  • Consider switching CompareExchange and similar intrinsics to have self-referring implementations. #86915
  • Consider removing all the resx schema unnecessary comments auto added by Visual Studio #86906
  • [browser][mt] Running any Thread for longer than 5000 ms crashes runtime (Blazor) #86903
    8.0.0
  • Error: Unable to read data from the transport connection: Connection reset by peer when using Httpclient in Dotnet core api #86893
  • dotnet store fails because of content files (Microsoft.NET.ComposeStore.targets(345,5): error MSB3024) #86901
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions on 5/27/2023 12:14:23 AM #86905
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 20 Regressions on 5/26/2023 9:55:14 AM #86904
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 40 Regressions on 5/27/2023 12:14:23 AM #86902
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #86887
  • Fix AddMetrics extension method namespace #86885
    8.0.0
  • App crashes on device when calling static abstract interface method #86884
    8.0.0
  • [mono] export containers header #86879

Closed

  • Thaisantdart•Pro #86926
  • `System.Text.Json` source generator creates default type converters for properties with `JsonConverter` attribute #86223
    8.0.0
  • `System.Text.Json` ignores `JsonConverter` attribute #86222
    8.0.0
  • Micro-optimizations for STJ generated source #52218
    Future
  • StringBuilder and exception in stringinterpolation causes partial string to be written to builder #86897
  • [API Proposal]: Consider changing return types of new throw helpers #86341
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when deserializing object containing nullable struct using source generator #86483
    8.0.0
  • Standardize on DiagnosticSource/OpenTelemetry for database tracing #22336
  • System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory: overloads to write to a stream rather than a file #1555
    8.0.0
  • Correct way to handle obsolete OOB dependencies on multi-targeted packages? #86894
  • [API Proposal]: Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #76984
    8.0.0
  • Invalid IL produced by unreachable code blocks optimization #86304
  • [wasm][hybridglobalization] ToUpper/ToLower does not work correctly when the length of character changes #86794
    8.0.0
  • RuntimeHostConfigurationOption for GC configuration ignored in NativeAOT #85961
  • [mono] Unhandled Exception in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests #86861

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter type cast opcodes & add zero page optimizations #86928
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove comment in ZipFile.Create.cs #86927
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2190984 #86925
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [main] [release/8.0-preview5] Use fully qualified type names for parameters and don't copy parameter attributes #86922
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #86920
    area-Debugger-mono
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few cleanups in stack walking on Windows #86917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add individual compilation tests for each config binding overload #86910
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Create DiagnosticInfo as an incremental Diagnostic replacement type. #86908
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][interp] Preserve type information of stack args when inlining #86898
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implemented IndexOf and LastIndexOf functions #86895
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Implement genCodeForIncSaturate #86891
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • For the dprintf output of the median overhead figure, the type of the… #86886
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use Knobs to populate AppContext switches #86883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup BitMapper sizeof type #86881
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Ensure Memory<T>/ReadOnlyMemory<T> are marked as unsupported types. #86900
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Use fully qualified type names for parameters and don't copy parameter attributes #86899
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-preview5] [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86912
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ClrEtwAllMeta.lst for the ContentionLockCreated event #86907
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Fix deserialization of nullable structs with constructors. #86896
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix assert failure in grow_heap_segment for SVR GC. #86889
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Change the LockCreated event to ContentionLockCreated #86817
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix formatting issues in DependencyGraphViewer #86890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` fix bug in change case #86799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [NativeAOT] Fix MD array GC series #86877
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not compute debug names of reflection objects #86880
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Annotate test with IsPreciseGcSupported #86869
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier intrinsic #86842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Use underlying type converter for nullable type #84208
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the Prolog/Epilog for enabling OSR. #86866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update binder gen parser to issue diagnostics for invalid input types #86856
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not have default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #86812
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] thread experiments #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Remove cast bug #86862
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
